Summary: Bright circular object at high speed and high altitude going south to north.
divs: Sighting DetailsAt the time of the sighting,I was at home standing on my porch calling my dog. I live far out in the country and there is no real ambiant light. Although there was a half-moon it was quite dark as it was covered by a thick cloud cover. While waiting for my dog I looked up to admire the stars. At this time I noticed a bright disc or circular object at a very high altitude and at a high rate of speed traveling in a south to north direction. At first I thought it was just a plane but as I watched I began to realize that it was very high up and moving at a much faster rate of speed than I have observed conventional or military aircraft at various altitudes. My second thought was that it could be a satelite. I discounted this as it didn't seem to be that high and I didn't think a satelite would be moving that fast if in orbit. I further dismissed a meteor as it left no vapor or fire trail as it mantained a constant level flight. The brightness of the object's light was also constant. There were no flashing lights, strobes or anything of that nature. After a couple of minutes it disappeared behind a bank of clouds and did not re-appear. I hesitated reporting this sighting as I am not given to thinking that every light in the sky is a UFO but I could come to no other logical conclusion. I'm a retired military veteran with 34 years of combined service and have flown in many types of aircraft all over the world and am familar with most all military aircraft.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in West Liberty
There were no other sightings in West Liberty on or around July 20th 2010
